Package atg.clicktoconnect

Interface Summary
C2CSavable this interface must be implemented by anything which wants to be added to the C2CSavers list in C2CManager
 

Class Summary
C2CConfiguration Holds ClickToConnect configuration
C2CSessionDataPropertyManager This class holds the configured names of the C2CSession repository item properties.
C2CTokenGenerator This class generates unique tokens that can be used to indentify individual connections.
 

Exception Summary
C2CSessionException An exception thrown by the ClickToConnect application
